page.title: 14FARMING in SPEY VALLEY (4)
page.content:
{1985}has brought news of farms being sold and farmers trust their leases will continue. Buyers who will agree to leasing back the shooting rights on the hills must be found as present landlords wish to maintain these rights as a source of income as well as for personal use.
Land along the river is being{sold and it is hoped the neighbouring{RSPB will add it to their Reserve. The present owner talks of{draining}this land but this is considered against everybody's interests, perhaps even the farmer, as the soil is poor.
{_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_
